name: Mufaro's Daughter
description:
Mufaro's Daughter is a narrative 2D RPG that allows you to walk through a folktale as the protagonist, ultimately deciding the protagnist's fate in this retelling. It is based on Mufaro's Beautiful Daughters by John Steptoe, though some things have been changed to make the game more interactive.

  • Player controls
    • WASD/Arrow keys for movement
    • "I" to interact with an object with a visual cue
    • "Enter"/"Return" to continue dialogue
    • "Space" to make choice selection in dialogue
    • "E" to exit dialogue box
